sections.title: Erratum
paragraphs: In the article Practical Experiments with Regular Approximation of Context-Free Languages by Mark-Jan Nederhof that appeared in Computational Linguistics 26(1), the equation on page 19 that reads 3i[A E Ni A B E Nil - 3O~l,fll, o~2, f12[A -~* c~lBfll A B --+*

sections.title: o~2Af12],
paragraphs: should read 3i[A E Ni A B C Ni] 4# 30~l,fll, Oe2, fl2[a ---+* O~lBfll A B --+*
